Alliance Planner (points) table Compares point scoring performance for selected competitions for projected alliances. competition year robot competition robot pointsAAR cargoScoredTotalAverage panelScoredTotalAverage objectsScoredTotalAverage HABEndPos3Percent HABEndPos2Percent startingPos2SuccessPercent startingPos1SuccessPercent defensePercent pointsAAR,toFixed,1 cargoScoredTotalAverage,toFixed,2 panelScoredTotalAverage,toFixed,2 objectsScoredTotalAverage,toFixed,2 HABEndPos3Percent,toFixed,2 HABEndPos2Percent,toFixed,2 startingPos2SuccessPercent,toFixed,2 startingPos1SuccessPercent,toFixed,2 defensePercent,toFixed,2 pointsAAR pointsAAR cargoScoredTotalAverage panelScoredTotalAverage objectsScoredTotalAverage robotGroup
Robot Ranking Shows Master AAR rankings for all robots in a year. table robot year robot masterAAR scoringAAR cycleTimeAAR HABAAR masterAAR,DESC masterAAR,toFixed,2 scoringAAR,toFixed,2 cycleTimeAAR,toFixed,2 HABAAR,toFixed,2
Robot Ranking (bar) Shows Master AAR rankings for all robots in a year. bar robot year robot masterAAR masterAAR,ASC
Robot Ranking (pie) Shows Master AAR rankings for all robots in a year. pie robot year robot masterAAR masterAAR,ASC
Detailed Robot Ranking (bar) Shows Detailed AAR rankings for all robots in a year. bar robot year robot masterAAR scoringAAR HABAAR cycleTimeAAR masterAAR,ASC
Robot Ranking at Competition Shows Master AAR rankings for all robots in a selected competition. table competition year competition robot masterAAR scoringAAR cycleTimeAAR HABAAR masterAAR,DESC masterAAR,toFixed,2 scoringAAR,toFixed,2 cycleTimeAAR,toFixed,2 HABAAR,toFixed,2
Robot Ranking at Competition (bar) Shows Master AAR rankings for all robots in a selected competition. bar competition year competition robot masterAAR masterAAR,ASC
Robot Average Score per Match by Competition (bar) Shows Average Score for all robots in a selected competition. bar competition year competition robot pointsAAR pointsAAR,ASC
Robot Total Items Scored Trend Trend of total items scored trend match year robot competition date robot objectsScoredTotal date,ASC
Robot Competition Performance Trend Performance of robot(s) over a given competition. trend match year robot competition date robot masterAAR date,ASC
Robot Competition Points Trend Point Score of robot(s) over a given competition. trend match year robot competition date robot pointsAAR date,ASC
